thread.title: Mann Ki Baat LIVE updates: PM Narendra Modi to address 30th edition of radio programme at 11 am

author: FE Online
title: Mann Ki Baat LIVE updates: PM Narendra Modi to address 30th edition of radio programme at 11 am
text:
India news Mann Ki Baat LIVE updates: PM Narendra Modi to address 30th edition of radio programme at 11 am Mann Ki Baat LIVE updates: PM Narendra Modi to address 30th edition of radio programme at 11 am Prime Minister Narendra Modi will address the nation in the 30th edition of his monthly radio Programme 'Mann Ki Baat' today. By: FE Online | Updated: March 26, 2017 10:36 AM After holding position of the PM, Modi has been delivering his thoughts to the public of the country through this programme from October 3, 2014. (PTI) 
Prime Minister Narendra Modi will address the nation in the 30th edition of his monthly radio programme ‘Mann Ki Baat’ today. After becoming the Prime Minister, Modi started the programme on It started on October 3, 2014. Since the, this has been Modi’s standard practise of delivering his thoughts on social issues. In his last address on February 26, the PM talked about his Swachch Bharat scheme, the BHIM app and the other schemes launched by the government in public interest. He had also hailed the support of common people in the initiatives taken by the government with special appreciation for IAS officer Param Iyer who set an excellent example for others by cleaning a toilet to spread the messageof hygience in the samll town of Gangadevipalli, Warangal. He also appreciated Doordarshan for giving him a platform for a special programme on ‘Swachchhta Samachar’ inspired by his Swach Bharat Abhiyan. 
The broadcast will begin at 11 am and will be broadcast by All India Radio (AIR), Doordarshan and on the prime minister’s official website. Catch here all the LIVE updates.
